p: Infectious diseases are among the most important cause of morbidity and mortality worldwide. This is worsened by drug resistance, one of the greatest challenges of the 21st century ( Hofer, 2019; Tacconelli and Pezzani, 2019). The importance of plants as a source of effective anti-microbial agents is well established. Several reports dealing with the anti-bacterial and anti-fungal effects of Eriosema species have been documented.
